rationale: The agent's changes are fundamentally incorrect and move in the opposite direction from the ground truth. The task was to 'revert the config/templates loading behavior back to 0.90.7 format', but the agent removed template loading from MetaDataCreateIndexService.java (lines 475-495) instead of changing fromXContent to fromXContentStandalone. The ground truth shows the correct reversion: (1) changing one method call in MetaDataCreateIndexService.java:485, (2) updating test files template0.json, template1.json, template2.json to wrap templates in a named object, and (3) fixing the random template selector from randomInt(1) to randomInt(2). The agent instead moved template loading to LocalGatewayMetaState.java with a completely new loadTemplates() method, which changes the architecture rather than reverting to the old format. The agent also missed all test file changes (3 JSON templates and the test class update). This demonstrates a complete misunderstanding of the reversion task. Critical correctness penalty of -0.4 applied for breaking the intended functionality; major completeness penalty of -0.3 for missing all test changes.
